resources.string: Server is busy. Please try again later.
Scanning the qr code requires the ability to open the camera and the astigmatic light.
Please fill in the mnemonic word correctly.
Failed to import the wallet, please try again.
Set your wallet ID associated with your contacts, which supports letter, number and underline, and only begins with letter. The wallet ID cannot be modified once it is set.
ID only supports letter, number and underline
Check that the wallet ID failed.
Please input the wallet password again
Tip: Please remember your password, BitBill cannot save user’s password, and does not have the service of finding or resetting password.
Failed to initialize the wallet. Please try again.
Failed to retrieve wallet information. Please try again.
Reset password failed, please try again.
Failed to create wallet, please try again
Password reset successfully. Please save your mnemonic words and password.
Wallet is created successfully, please save the mnemonic words in a safe place for the backups of wallet before using it.
Wallet import successfully. Please save your mnemonic words and password.
Parsing the transaction list information failed.
The camera failed to open, please check permissions.
Put the QR code into the box,it will automatically scan.
Please confirm that your surroundings is safe. Anyone who gets your mnemonic words can transfer your digital assets.
Screenshot is unsafe, which may be used by other apps. Please write down the mnemonic words below and then save it. It will be confirmed on next screen.
Click on the mnemonic words orderly to confirm whether your backup is right.
Please keep your mnemonic words carefully
Get the confirmation password failed, please retype it.
Please click the below words in the correct order
Please review your mnemonic words correctly.
Failed to load transfer details, please return to retry.
To protect your privacy, new address is used every time you receive coins. The old address can still be used.
Failed to generate the collection qr code, please return to retry.
Failed to get the contact\'s latest address.
Add the address as the frequent contact for the next transaction
Failed to generate change address, please try again.
You don\'t have a contact yet.
Are you sure to delete this contact？
The contact information failed. Please return to try again.
Please be cautious about this operation, confirm that your wallet has been backed up before deleting, or the digital assets cannot be found.
Generate wallet ID qr code failed.

The agreement is between the user (hereafter referred to as “you” or “the user”) and BITBILL PTY LTD (hereafter referred to as “BitBill” or “We”) .

You cannot download, install, or use this software and related services unless you have read and accepted all terms hereof. Any operation of this software will be deemed as that you have read and agree to be bounded by this agreement.

1. Services Offered

You can use BitBill to create or import the wallet, store any digital asset supported by BitBill, and manage the wallet; multiple wallets can be created by BitBill, and all of them can be used to store several types of digital assets supported by BitBill. Each wallet possesses different ID and varied mnemonic words;

You can transfer your digital assets through receiving function and transferring function of BitBill. It should be noticed that any actual asset transfer is processed on the related blockchain system (rather than on BitBill). You are fully aware the irrevocability of the blockchain-based transaction. You also acknowledge that BitBill cannot suspend or revoke any transferring transaction and so forth. In addition, the transferring action should be confirmed by the password. Provided that you forget the password, you can recover your wallet through the backup mnemonic words to reset your password;

You can use BitBill to add a new contact person who is linked to the wallet ID or address to facilitate the transaction of the digital asset; please backup the recovery key of the contact person. You can recover the contact list by the recovery key;

We would backup part or all of your transaction records through the blockchain system. Nevertheless, the accuracy of transaction record should be subject to the record in the blockchain system.

BitBill recommends you to acquire basic knowledge about digital asset prior to your application of the BitBill software. It is appropriate to use the BitBill wallet as you fully understand the digital asset.

2. You Own Your Private Keys

Differing from financial institutions in the banking industry, BitBill, inheriting the decentral characteristic of the blockchain, provides a decentralization service to protect the safety of the digital asset of the user.

BitBill does not provide following services: saving user’s wallet password and mnemonic words; retrieving user’s password and mnemonic words; freezing the wallet; reporting the loss of wallet; recovering the wallet; performing the transaction rollback. The user shall personally keep his/her all mnemonic words because BitBill does not provide aforementioned services;

You will acknowledge and agree that you cannot access the digital asset in the BitBill wallet, provided that you lose your access to such wallet, and do not backup the relating mnemonic words or lose such backup at the same time. BitBill cannot recover your wallet or retrieve the wallet password or mnemonic words; BitBill does not bear any liability caused by any damage resulting from aforementioned reason.

It should be noticed that any transaction request is irrevocable. Therefore, provided that the user performs an error operation (including but not limited to transferring to the wrong person, wrong address, and input wrong money amount), BitBill cannot revoke any transaction and bear any liability resulting from such error conduct.

Provided that you cannot understand the aforementioned content, BitBill recommends you to fully learn the knowledge about the cryptocurrency prior to the application of BitBill wallet.

3. User’s Obligation and Liability

The user must be a natural person with full capacity for civil conduct. Provided that you are a juvenile under 18 years old, you shall read and accept the BitBill agreement, and use the BitBill software under the direction of your parent or guardian. Provided that the personal with no capacity for civil conduct uses BitBill, or the person with limited capacity for civil conduct performs a transaction exceeding his/her civil rights or conduct limitation, BitBill would be entitled to require such person and his/her parents or guardian to bear any liability resulting from such operation;

ou shall bear the liability for the digital assets possessed by you;

You shall properly keep your mnemonic words and the recovery key of the contact person;

You shall assure the accuracy of the contact person as you add a new contact person in case of any irreparable damage caused by any irrevocable transaction;

You shall assure that any operation of BitBill is subject to Australian laws;

You shall not store the digital asset to the address unsupported by BitBill;

Any operation of yours shall not disturb other users or numeral functioning of BitBill’s servers, including excessive application of API and spam email;

Any operation of yours relating to the BitBill should not violate Australian laws and your local laws;

4. No Control Over Blockchains

Regarding any digital asset supported by BitBill, it is not created and cannot be controlled by BitBill. You shall bear full liability for your choice and operation relating to the digital asset.

5. Integration of Third-party Application

BitBill may integrate third-party applications. Despite that BitBill may facilitate your access to the integrated third-party application, BitBill does not bear any liability resulting from your operation of such third-party application. You should contact the third-party organization provided that you need any help.

6. Transactions

Effective blockchain transaction is only formed by the digital asset transaction actually recorded on the blockchain.

BitBill may allow you to send the directive for digital asset transaction. Nevertheless, BitBill cannot guarantee that such transaction through BitBill would be actually stored on the blockchain. You must assure that your transaction is subject to the application rules of BitBill software, (especially for smart contract system such as ETH).

BitBill does not have any service charge for the moment.Other agreement or rules will be issued provided that BitBill charges any service in the future.

Certain transaction operation may occur transaction fee (such as mining fee), which depends on the requirement of the digital asset possessed by you. BitBill may not bear any liability in respect of any damage resulting from inappropriate setting of your transaction fee, (either being excessively high or low).

7. Disclaimer

BitBill may not bear any liability resulting from following conditions:

The loss of digital asset results from the loss of the mobile device, deletion and failed backup of BitBill, deletion and failed backup of wallet mnemonic word, stealing of the wallet, and forgetting wallet password and mnemonic word;

The loss of digital asset results from user’s leakage of wallet password, private key, and mnemonic word, lending or transferring the mobile device or BitBill wallet, authorizing other person to use the mobile device or BitBill wallet, failing to download BitBill software through the official channel of BitBill; other dangerous operation relating to BitBill software.

The loss of the digital asset results from the improper operation of the user (including but not limited to wrong input of transferring address, contact person, and money amount);

The loss of the digital asset results from error operation because of user’s failed understanding about blockchain technology;

The deviation occurred as BitBill backups the transaction record saved on user’s blockchain results from reasons including time lag, unstable blockchain system, and so forth;

Any risk and consequence results from user’s operation on the third-party application;

It should be noticed that, although this software has passed the beta test and has been continuously modified based on the feedback from open source users and the community, we cannot assure that there is no error in the software. Therefore, you shall acknowledge and accept that the application of this software is decided under your freewill, and you would bear any liability resulting from such application;

8. Privacy

You shall fully aware that your following information collected by BitBill may be used to satisfy your service demand for BitBill, and we pay much attention to the protection of your privacy.

Information collected by us may include: information about your mobile device, operation record, transaction record, wallet ID, wallet address, contact person, and so forth.

In accordance with the law, BitBill may collect and use your personal information under following condition without your authorization: for national safety and national defense; for public safety, public sanitary, and major public interest; for crime investigation, litigation, trial, and execution of judgement; the collected information has been published to the society by the user; the collected information comes from legitimately disclosed information such as news and information published by the government; for the safety and the legal compliance of the service, including investigating and treating the breakdown of the product and the service; other conditions in accordance with the law.

We may use your information by following methods:

a. We confirm the connection between you and your wallet’s contact person through the only serial number on your mobile device.

b. We may timely send important notices including software upgrade and alternation of service agreement.

c. In accordance with this agreement and other regulations of BitBill, BitBill may manage user’s operation by using user’s information.

d. To cooperate the requirement of laws, regulations, and authorizations.

9. Intelligent Property

BITBILL PTY LTD is the only obligee of the intelligent property of this software. BitBill is entitled all intelligent properties of this software including copyright, trademark right, patent right, and business secret, and all intelligent properties relating to all information used in the software (including but not limited to brands, logos, trademarks, this agreement, words, videos, audios, pictures, diagrams, interface designs, version frameworks, and codes). The user may only use BitBill software and information in this software for the purpose of possessing and managing the digital asset. Without prior written consent of BitBill, no one can use, alternate, decompile, duplicate, publicly distribute, change, spread, sell or disclose aforementioned software and information.

You shall bear any risk resulting from application of this software. We reserve the right to modify this agreement at any time. In respect to the unsettled matter of this agreement, you shall be subject to the public anouncement and related rules issued by BitBill from time to time.

BITBILL PTY LTD

Version 20180104
